GClasses::GTwtNode

GClasses::GTwtNode Class Reference

Represents a single node in the DOM of a GTwtDoc. More...

#include <GTwt.h>

 Returns the type of this node.
bool asBool ()
 Returns the boolean value stored by this node. Throws if this is not a bool type.
long long asInt ()
 Returns the 64-bit integer value stored by this node. Throws if this is not an integer type.

 Returns the double value stored by this node. Throws if this is not a double type.

 Returns the string value stored by this node. Throws if this is not a string type.

 Returns the number of items in this list. Throws if this is not a list type.
GTwtNode * item (size_t index)
 Returns the "index" item in this list. Throws if this is not a list type.
GTwtNode * setItem (size_t index, GTwtNode *pNode)
 Sets the "index" item in this list. Throws if this is not a list type. Returns the pNode. Yes, it returns the same node that you pass in.
GTwtNode * fieldIfExists (const char *szName)
 Returns the node with the specified field name. Throws if this is not an object type. Returns NULL if this is an object type, but there is no field with the specified name.
GTwtNode * field (const char *szName)
 Returns the node with the specified field name. Throws if this is not an object type. Throws if there is no field with the name specified by szName.

 Adds a field with the specified name to this object. Throws if this is not an object type Returns the pNode. Yes, it returns the same node that you pass in. Why?

Detailed Description

Represents a single node in the DOM of a GTwtDoc.
